name: Ice Maiden
description: The Ice Maiden embodies chilling elegance with an alluring yet dangerous presence, wielding formidable powers associated with ice and snow.
memorable: Her ability to charm and manipulate foes while dealing significant cold damage makes her a uniquely threatening adversary.
goals: To charm, manipulate, and dominate others around her, utilizing her ice powers effectively in combat.
relations: Related to ice-themed creatures and could serve under more powerful fey or cold entities.
environment: Often found in icy or snowy terrains, preferring areas where she can maximize her cold abilities.
strengths: Possesses high Charisma for social manipulation, effective combat abilities, and powerful cold damage attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which can be exploited by her enemies.
attacks: Multiattack with Ice Blade dealing slashing and cold damage or Ice Bolt dealing significant cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Icy Embrace allows her to deal substantial cold damage and restrain enemies with ice.
senses: Snow Sight enables her to see through snow or fog without penalty.
skills: Excels in Deception and Persuasion due to her high Charisma, and is quite stealthy with a Stealth bonus of +6.
additional_information: Chilling Presence can deal damage and extinguish flames nearby.
Ice Walk allows movement across icy surfaces without penalty.
Magic Resistance grants her advantage on saving throws against spells.
Kiss of the Frozen Heart grants immunity to cold while charming the target.
Snow Step allows teleportation through snow or ice.
test_queries: ice themed creature with charming abilities
skirmisher that can teleport through snow
